Maven FAST plugin - A maven plugin which can process esi tags on static resources. The main use case is for HTML developement : you can create blocks, templates and use them to generate pages.
This plugins works great in the Eclipse IDE and does not require any local server.
Esigate portlet - A proxy portlet which can include pages from other websites.
